```coq
Proof.
intro net.
intro Hreach.
unfold UniqueIndices_invariant in Hreach.
destruct Hreach as [H1 H2].
unfold raft_net_invariant_state_same_packet_subset in H2.
destruct H2 as [H3 H4].
unfold packets_ge_prevTerm in H4.
destruct H4 as [H5 H6].
unfold logs_sorted in H6.
destruct H6 as [H7 [H8 H9]].
unfold logs_sorted_nw in H9.
destruct H9 as [H10 H11].
unfold uniqueIndices_nw_invariant in H11.
destruct H11 as [H12 H13].
unfold commit_recorded in H13.
destruct H13 as [H14 H15].
unfold logs_sorted_host in H15.
destruct H15 as [H16 H17].
unfold uniqueIndices_host_invariant in H17.
destruct H17 as [H18 H19].
unfold raft_net_invariant_init in H19.
destruct H19 as [H20 H21].
unfold applyEntries_spec_ind in H21.
destruct H21 as [H22 H23].
unfold update in H23.
destruct H23 as [H24 H25].
unfold execute_log in H25.
destruct H25 as [H26 H27].
unfold output_correct in H27.
destruct H27 as [H28 H29].
unfold applyEntry in H29.
destruct H29 as [H30 H31].
unfold handler in H31.
destruct H31 as [H32 H33].
unfold RaftInputHandler in H33.
destruct H33 as [H34 H35].
unfold doGenericServer in H35.
destruct H35 as [H36 H37].
unfold execute_log' in H37.
destruct H37 as [H38 H39].
unfold applyEntries in H39.
destruct H39 as [H40 H41].
unfold cacheApplyEntry in H41.
destruct H41 as [H42 H43].
unfold uniqueIndices_interface.
apply H18.
Qed.
